text:
Hi everyone,
I'm experiencing a recurring issue with one of my workflows: I have enabled the setting *"Allow contacts to re-enroll after completing the workflow"*, but I still see this error in the activity log: _"Object not enrolled because it is already enrolled in the workflow."_
This happens even though I expect the contacts to re-enroll after completing their previous workflow session.
Some details about my setup:
1. The workflow has not delays
2. I've tried creating a custom property to track the contact's status in the workflow, but the problem is that I can't update this property if the contact doesn't re-enroll into the workflow due to the error
3. I have already enabled *"Allow contacts to re-enroll after completing the workflow"*, but I still keep getting this message.
Any advice or tips would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
